GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.10.36
GSD.description:
mtd: physmap: physmap-bt1-rom: Fix unintentional stack access

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.36 by commit 34ec706bf0b7c4ca249a729c1bcb91f706c7a7be, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit b3e79e7682e075326df8041b826b03453acacd0a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mtd: physmap: physmap-bt1-rom: Fix unintentional stack access
